title: Troubleshooting - Landline No Dial Tone
description: An elderly customer reports their landline phone has no dial tone.

tasks.description: Run a remote line test to check for faults from the network side.
tasks.expected_outcome: The line test comes back as 'Clear', indicating the issue is likely inside the home.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to check if their phone is properly plugged into the wall jack.
If the issue persists, schedule a technician to investigate the internal wiring.
